curam.core.struct

Class CuramQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.type.struct.Struct<CuramQuery>
      • curam.core.struct.CuramQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepCloneable, java.io.Serializable

    public final class CuramQuery
extends Struct<CuramQuery>
    Represents a search query that accepts multiple search conditions.
    See Also:

    • Field Detail

      • maxHits

        public long maxHits
        Sets the maximum number of returned results for this search. If set, this value will override the search service 'maximum returned results' setting.

        MAX_NUMBER_OF_HITS -> long

      • isUnbounded

        public boolean isUnbounded
        Specifies unbounded number of returned results for this search. If this attribute is set, all results that match the search criteria will be returned.

        BOOLEAN_TYPE -> boolean

      • searchServiceId

        public java.lang.String searchServiceId
        TODO: JavaDoc.

        QUERY_TEXT -> String

        The default field name to be used for query text.

        SEARCH_SERVICE_STRING -> String
